doc_id: STEERCO-OCTOBER 2025 — SMARTONBOARDX STEERING COMMITTEE MEETING MINUTES-3
text:
October closed the quarter on a high note.
 Both Acme Tech and Delta Logistics—the former red-tier accounts—transitioned to healthy status following sustained engineering and customer success interventions.
 The platform’s average health score reached its best level of the year (0.81), and churn probability dropped below 10 %.
 Customer sentiment rebounded, feature usage rose, and renewal momentum confirmed that earlier trade-offs paid off.
 The focus now shifts from firefighting to growth and scalability.
source_path: D:\CUE_\Data sets\Steerco minutes\OCTOBER 2025 — SMARTONBOARDX STEERING COMMITTEE MEETING MINUTES.docx
